name: Forks of Flame
description:
Forks of Flame is a small indie game. Main goal of the player is to burn down the entire forest in this world. To do this, you will need to earn score points. The bigger your score, the more opportunities you have.  There is 1 level in the game, but it's not final version. You are a little flame, but you have the opportunity to change this world. The flame must grow! Evil will not prevent this! Earn 500 points to fight the boss! 

Main game mechanics

The main mechanics is burning the forest and earning points, points can be spent on useful buffs. The more points you have, the bigger trees you can destroy, and in the end you will be able to defeat the boss of the level. Game have a system of usefull buffs, Red tent increases your maximum health, Green tent increases your strength and number of dashes. Near campfire u can earn score points, but it's too long, also u can regenerate self health. Torches give a passive regeneration of health. For defeat boss you must kill him minions.

How to play FoF?

Forks of Flame supports keyboard and Windows.

Keyboard

Fire Attack - LMB

Movement - WASD

Jump - Space

Dash - Shift

Map - M

Storm Blast - C  

Information from developers

We really want to know if you liked the game. Please write reviews, it's the first project from us and we want to bring it to the end.
